job_history.work_description: Manage and oversee the daily operation of accounting department including. Monthly bank reconciliations over 10 companies. Manage rent roll, and collections. Prepare overall accounting reports and internal financial statement.

Manage and oversee the daily operation of accounting department. Conducted month-end balance sheet reviews and reconciled any variances. Coded the general ledger and processed vendor invoice payments. Coordinated approval processes of all accounts payable invoices. Investigated and resolved discrepancies in monthly bank accounts while under tight deadlines. Prepared annual federal, state and local tax returns.

Manage and oversee the daily operation of accounting department including; Account payable/receivable *Cash recipes * General ledger * Payroll * Collection * Bank Reconciliations * Check run * Fixed assets activity. Quarterly, monthly and annual local and state tax returns. Monitor and analyze accounting data and produce financial and productivity reports. Banks deposit and office mail pickup. Monitors and maintains office supplies inventory. Manage office vendors, service providers and maintains certifications documentation updated. Maintain fiscal files and all documents transaction. Preparation of Annual 480 and W2.

Account reconciliations. Journal and general ledger entries and postings. Manage Accounts payable and accounts receivable as well, also make collection efforts. In charge of payroll and administration of employee benefits. Responsible for all invoicing activities. In charge of office supply and inventory. Assist the Controller with overall administrative duties including human resources and financial analysis of the company.

Responsible for preparing federal and state income tax returns for the small business firm and individuals. Calculate sales and depreciation for various tax reports. Prepare a financial analysis to properly assess customers on government tax laws and incentives. Audit previous tax files to identify corrective opportunities. Occasionally verifies totals on forms prepared by others to detect errors of arithmetic or procedure. Make recommendations on how to improve future financial performance. Work as a part of an advisory team to effectively address issues.

Providing analysis services and financial advising, helping individuals to take the best decision at the time of make any financial investment. Mortgage consulting and marketing of different types of loans including constructions and comercial loan Monthly sales over 2.5M. Analyzing financial information and credit profiles for pre approval purpose. Seek for potential customers through telemarketing and special promotional events. Answered customers' questions regarding products, prices and availability.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with monthly bank reconciliations, balance sheet reviews, and resolving discrepancies in bank accounts, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience with all aspects of accounting, including account payable/receivable, general ledger, payroll, and financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Consistently handled payroll responsibilities, including payroll processing and administration of employee benefits, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed budgeting responsibilities, including financial analysis and reporting, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised accounting departments and teams, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Tax Preparation
skills.explanation: Prepared federal, state, and local tax returns, including sales and depreciation calculations, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Conducted financial analysis, including financial reporting and productivity analysis, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Account Management
skills.explanation: Managed accounts payable and accounts receivable, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for financial reporting and analysis, indicating strong proficiency.
